mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report_board (report_id, title, content, writer_id, writer_name, writer_pw, status, assigned, file_original_name, file_saved_name, file_mime_type, file_size, reg, email) VALUES (report_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content, jdbcType=CLOB}, #{writerId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writerName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writerPw, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assigned, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileOriginalName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSavedName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileMimeType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSize, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SYSDATE, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
